title: Uganda Food Inflation
description: Cost of food in Uganda increased 22.20 percent in October of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Food Inflation in Uganda averaged 5.49 percent from 1998 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 40.65 percent in July of 2011 and a record low of -11.22 percent in July of 2005. This page provides the latest reported value for - Uganda Food Inflation - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: Uganda Bureau of Statistics
